Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: ~btl5037 - Do you have more details on this?

Action.author: btl5037
Action.body: Let me open a Jira to write an integration test for this. It's easily reproducible by various means, but an integration test should be able to help narrow down the issue by taking some of the external factors out of the equation.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Would this happen on kube containerd?

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~btl5037 Could you summarize where you left off with this one, then we can pass it over to ~sykesm
